pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, June 29, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

The Prime Minister will speak with the Palestinian Authority President, Mahmoud Abbas.

Closed to media.

1:35 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a fireside chat with Charles Milliard, President and Chief Executive Officer of the Fédération des chambres de commerce du Québec (FCCQ).

The chat will be streamed live on the FCCQ’s Facebook page via the following link: https://www.facebook.com/FCCQ.Reseau

7:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will take part in a virtual conversation with Melissa Grelo, co-host of CTV’s The Social, as part of a virtual event celebrating Filipino Heritage Month in Canada.

Media interested in watching the event live can contact Mikaela.Harrison@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca for details.
